mapper.select: select d_no, d_id, d_name, d_nae from dept
select d_no, d_id, d_name, d_nae from dept where d_no = #{d_no}
mapper.insert: insert into dept(d_no, d_id, d_name, d_nae) values(SEQ_DEPT_NO.nextval,#{d_id}, #{d_name},#{d_nae})
mapper.update: update dept set d_id = #{d_id}, d_name = #{d_name}, d_nae = #{d_nae} where d_no = #{d_no}
